title: Homepage Hero: Update messaging to focus on core AI automation services
description: Current hero says 'AI-Driven Success Redefining the Future' which is generic. Should explicitly mention: Voice AI Agents, Calling Agents, Workflow Automation, Custom Software Development, AI Engineer Staffing. Need compelling headline that differentiates from generic AI agencies.

title: Add Voice AI / Calling Agents dedicated landing page
description: Create dedicated page for Voice AI and Calling Agent services. Should include: How it works, Use cases (customer support, sales calls, appointment booking, lead qualification), Benefits (24/7 availability, cost reduction, scalability), Integration options, Demo request CTA. This is a key differentiator service.

title: Review full project: fix images, add case study detail pages
description:
Review the full project and identify improvements needed:
- Ensure all images are displaying properly across the site
- Add basic details for all case studies
- Create individual case study pages that open when clicking on a case study
- Each case study page should contain detailed information about that project
close_reason: Completed: Case study pages, SEO meta tags, and Blog section all implemented

title: Fix placeholder content and links
description: Several placeholders need real content: 1) Social media links all point to '#' 2) Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567 is placeholder 3) Address: 123 Innovation Drive is fake 4) Terms & Privacy links are placeholders 5) Portfolio project links all '#'. Update with real company information.

title: Add Pricing/Packages page or section
description: Add transparent pricing information: Voice AI agent tiers (starter, professional, enterprise), Calling agent pricing models (per minute, per call, monthly), Workflow automation engagement types, AI engineer hiring rates (hourly, monthly, project). Even if 'Contact for pricing', show package tiers and what's included.

title: Update About page to reflect AI automation expertise
description: Current About page is generic. Should highlight: Team expertise in Voice AI, LLMs, automation. Company focus on practical AI solutions for business. Specific technology stack (OpenAI, custom LLMs, telephony integrations, etc.). Differentiate from generic 'AI agencies' by emphasizing actionable automation.

title: Mobile/tablet responsiveness improvements
description: Ensure the website is mobile and tablet friendly across all devices. Improvements include: optimized mobile mega menu, touch-friendly button sizes, responsive CSS for all breakpoints, safe area insets for notched devices, and improved touch feedback.
close_reason: Completed mobile/tablet responsiveness improvements: optimized mobile navigation menu with condensed services, added responsive CSS breakpoints, improved touch targets (min 48px), added safe area insets for notched devices, and improved touch feedback for interactive elements.

title: Add demo/trial CTA for Voice AI agents
description: Add a prominent section allowing visitors to request a demo or trial of Voice AI/Calling agents. Could include: Live demo booking, Sample call playback, Interactive chatbot demo, Free trial offer. This is crucial for conversion as Voice AI is a 'see it to believe it' service.

title: Improve main page: all AI services focus, new image, Hire Us section
close_reason: Updated main page to focus on all AI services instead of just Voice AI. Added new 'Why Choose Us' section with alternatives comparison (freelancers, agencies, in-house, off-the-shelf) and service cards (Voice AI, Automation, Custom AI, AI Talent). Updated About section with broader messaging and new image.

title: Add social proof specific to AI automation services
description: Current stats are generic (900+ ratings, 100+ projects). Need specific metrics: Number of Voice AI agents deployed, Calls handled by AI agents per month, Workflow hours automated, AI engineers placed, Customer support tickets handled. Real testimonials from clients using calling/voice agents.

title: Update FAQ with Voice AI and Calling Agent questions
description: Current FAQ is generic. Add specific questions: How do Voice AI agents handle different accents/languages? What's the setup time for a calling agent? Can agents integrate with our CRM/phone system? What's the cost per call/minute? How do you ensure call quality? Do you provide AI engineer trial periods?

title: Update Contact form with service-specific fields
description: Current contact form is generic. Add fields relevant to services: Which service interested in? (Voice AI, Calling Agents, Automation, Software Dev, AI Hiring), Current call volume (for Voice AI leads), Number of AI engineers needed (for hiring), Urgency/timeline. This qualifies leads better.

title: Add dedicated Services page with core service offerings
description: Create a new /services page that clearly outlines: 1) Voice AI Agents - conversational AI for customer support, sales, etc. 2) Calling Agents - automated phone calling systems 3) Workflow Automation - business process automation 4) Custom Software Development 5) AI Engineer Hiring/Staffing services. Each service needs detailed description, use cases, and benefits.

title: Add Use Cases / Industries section
description: Add a section showcasing specific use cases by industry: 1) Real Estate - appointment booking agents 2) Healthcare - patient intake calls 3) E-commerce - order status, returns handling 4) Financial Services - account inquiries 5) SaaS - onboarding assistance 6) Recruitment - candidate screening. Show how Voice AI/automation applies to each.

title: Add 'How It Works' section for Voice AI agents
description: Add a step-by-step section explaining how Voice AI/Calling agents work: 1) Discovery call to understand needs 2) Voice agent design & training 3) Integration with phone system/CRM 4) Testing & refinement 5) Deployment & monitoring 6) Continuous optimization. Visual flow diagram would help.

title: Update Services Section: Replace generic content with specific AI services
description: Current services section has vague descriptions like 'Smart Digital Solutions' and 'Elevating Brands with Strategy'. Replace with specific services: Voice AI Agents, Calling Agents, Workflow Automation, Custom Software Dev, AI Engineer Hiring. Include clear value propositions for each.

- Install GSAP and ScrollSmoother plugin
- Create a SmoothScroll wrapper component
- Apply smooth scrolling to all pages
- Configure scroll speed and effects
